Keywords: Amazon , Justice League , Warrior
Real Name: Diana
Special Powers
80 YEARS OF WONDER WOMAN: Wonder Woman has [Wonder Woman Ally team ability] and may start the game with any Wonder Woman Equipment equipped.
USE YOUR STRENGTH AGAINST YOU: Whenever Wonder Woman makes a close attack or is targeted with a close attack, you may choose attack or defense. For that attack, the attacker and the defender use each other's printed value of the chosen type.
